name: rex.fit
headline: Automating nutrition tracking.
description: Rex.fit is developing AI tools for nutrition. Our goal is to fully automate nutrition tracking. With Rex Nutribot, users can log their nutritional intake using photos and text directly through WhatsApp at +1 (229) 394-2678.  They can also receive meal plans, recipes, workout suggestions, 3D body scans to check body fat percentage and more. We also provide a white-label solution for gym chains, wellness centers, and healthcare providers.

founders.name: Ahmad Roumie, Founder
founders.description: On a mission to fully automate nutrition tracking - Order the DROP on kickstarter. Roboticist and calisthenics athlete. Also building an AI fitness and nutrition coach for fitness and wellness centers: take a photo of your meal and log it, log your workout, get workout and diet advice. Text Rex Nutribot on WhatsApp +1 (229) 394-2678. Previously worked on autonomous retail stores using computer vision, also worked on autonomous robots ((legged, UAVs, and crawlers)

markdown:
raw_markdown='[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/66854836d662cdaabfc0472c_rex_logo%20\(3\).png)](https://www.rex.fit/</>)[Workouts](https://www.rex.fit/<https:/app.rex.fit>)[Blog](https://www.rex.fit/</blog>)[B2B Solutions](https://www.rex.fit/</white-label>)
[Text the Rex Coach](https://www.rex.fit/<https:/wa.me/12293942678?text=Hi,%20I%27m%20referred%20by%20RexLandingPage>)[Looking for the Drop?](https://www.rex.fit/<https:/www.getdrop.ai>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/65392ff2e726f445f21d0c64_menu-icon-white.svg)
# Introducing the Drop 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/674f118b829492a61670bd0e_drop_intro_gif.gif)
The Drop is the world's first fully automated nutrition tracker. The Drop uses computer vision and AI to automatically record what you're eating throughout the day and provide you a full picture of the calories, proteins, fats and carbs you have eaten.**Say goodbye to manual calorie tracking forever.**
[Live on Kickstarter](https://www.rex.fit/<https:/www.kickstarter.com/projects/rangel/the-drop-fully-automated-nutrition-tracker>)
![rex.fit app icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/66854725de3de939e37bc629_New%20logo%20\(1\).svg)
# Track your calories from WhatsApp
Experience personalized health transformation with our AI calorie tracker and nutrition coach, tailored to your unique goals whether it's living healthier, shedding pounds, or gaining muscle.
[![whatsapp app icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/65393260c4c4e43f4ac7921c_whatsapp_logo.webp)Text Rex on Whatsapp](https://www.rex.fit/<https:/wa.me/12293942678?text=Hi,%20I%27m%20referred%20by%20RexLandingPage>)
# Get
# Rex
![iPhone frame](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/65392ff2e726f445f21d0c65_Apple%20iPhone%2011%20Pro%20Space%20Grey%201.png)
![rex nutribot screenshot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/658327050e1c233ed6fde600_File%20\(2\).jpg)![lock screen screenshot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/65392ff2e726f445f21d0c8b_LockScreen-Light.jpg)
[![play button](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/65392ff2e726f445f21d0c6f_play-button.svg)](https://www.rex.fit/<#>)
![ycombinator logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/65832126d9a64579febb7809_Y_Combinator_logo_text_wordmark.webp)![entrepreneur first logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/65832195b229fa23570fefff_ef.png)
[![Rex Nutribot - AI calorie tracking: workout and meal logging on WhatsApp | Product Hunt](https://api.producthunt.com/widgets/embed-image/v1/featured.svg?post_id=430815&theme=light)](https://www.rex.fit/<https:/www.producthunt.com/posts/rex-nutribot?utm_source=badge-featured&utm_medium=badge&utm_souce=badge-rex-nutribot>)
# Features
##### The easiest way to track calories
Send Rex a photo of your meal or just text what you ate to log it. It feels like texting a friend.
![iphone frame](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/65392ff2e726f445f21d0ca3_Apple%20iPhone%2012%20Pro%20Silver.png)
![rex nutribot screenshot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/658327050e1c233ed6fde600_File%20\(2\).jpg)
##### Get workout suggestions
Not sure how to workout today? Just ask Rex and get a tailored workout recommendation.
![iphone frame](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/65392ff2e726f445f21d0ca3_Apple%20iPhone%2012%20Pro%20Silver.png)
![rex screenshot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/6581e366485a9976c353dc28_IMG_2548.png)
##### Get daily reports and feedback
Check your daily report with personalized feedback and tips on your diet and lifestyle.
![iphone frame](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/65392ff2e726f445f21d0ca3_Apple%20iPhone%2012%20Pro%20Silver.png)
![rex nutribot screenshot 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/6583290e14584f2d51cb5454_Screenshot%202023-12-20%20at%2019.48.56.png)
# Scan your body with AI.
BMI is not accurate for our diverse bodies that can take all shapes and sizes. This is why we introduced our AI body scanner. Through body scanning, you can gain valuable insights into your body's metrics, enabling informed decisions about fitness, nutrition, and overall well-being. 
![bodyscan screenshot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/65f6c749d2de0de1bc6d3eb4_dashboard.png)
## Join tens of thousands on a quest for better health.
Living longer is a science, and we're here to help you improve daily.
##### I lost >10kg 
I used Rex to track my calories and get back in shape. I've since lost more than 10kg. The experience is great and I highly recommend trying them out._~ Kaan Armagan_
##### The calorie logging is ðŸ”¥
The calorie logging feature on Rex is great. I'm never going back to MyFitnessPal._~ Omar Ali_
##### I can finally track my own workouts
I've been looking for something I could just tell "I did 3 sets of 40 pushups" and it would just track it for me. The benefit of having my workouts and meals in the same convo on my phone is great. I also love the automated daily reports. _~Daniel Susviela_
##### It really feels like a personal coach
I've struggled with accountability my whole life. It's been hard to stick to a meal plan or a workout app. The fact that Rex texts me daily gives me the push I need. I text it all the time, even when I haven't worked out. Knowing that I will see what I ate in the report card at the end of the day keeps me from binge eating like I used to._~George Harris_
## Get product updates and more!
We will email you with our bi-weekly newsletter and product updates.
Thank you! Your submission has been received!
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.
![rex.fit app icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/66854725de3de939e37bc629_New%20logo%20\(1\).svg)
Try Rex now and begin your health transformation.
## Get fit, get Rex.
[![whatsapp app icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/65393260c4c4e43f4ac7921c_whatsapp_logo.webp)Text Rex on Whatsapp](https://www.rex.fit/<https:/wa.me/12293942678?text=Hi,%20I%27m%20referred%20by%20RexLandingPage>)
![rex screenshot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/6581e366ec558d63d7911282_IMG_2552.png)
![rex screenshot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/6581e366485a9976c353dc28_IMG_2548.png)
![rex nutribot screenshot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/658327050e1c233ed6fde600_File%20\(2\).jpg)
![iphone hand holding frame](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/65392ff2e726f445f21d0ca5_Hand-iPhoneX.png)
Follow us
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/65392ff2e726f445f21d0c6a_instagram.svg)](https://www.rex.fit/<https:/instagram.com/rexfit.app>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/65392ff2e726f445f21d0c83_twitter.svg)](https://www.rex.fit/<https:/twitter.com/rexfit_app>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/65392ff2e726f445f21d0c69_linkedin.svg)](https://www.rex.fit/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/rexfit/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65392ff2e726f445f21d0bf0/65392ff2e726f445f21d0c68_facebook.svg)](https://www.rex.fit/<https:/www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61552035002093&eav=AfZVzrXZSFHLLAFvKhkv29Lt4LuheRvb4-YIA02o7WWh7bqNzxbSeB7-05U2dFz_8Ho&tsid=0.7578073620160086>)

generated_description:
**Rex.fit: The Future of Nutrition Tracking**

Rex.fit is a cutting-edge startup founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's W23 batch. Headquartered in ZÃ¼rich, Switzerland, this small but ambitious team of four is on a mission to fully automate nutrition tracking using artificial intelligence.

Imagine being able to log your meals with a simple text or image. With Rex Nutribot, users can send photos or texts via WhatsApp to track their daily food intake effortlessly. This service isnâ€™t just about logging calories. Users receive meal plans, recipes, workout suggestions, and even 3D body scans to estimate body fat percentageâ€”all personalized to their health goals.

One standout product is **The Drop**, marketed as the world's first fully automated nutrition tracker. It employs computer vision technology to recognize food items, allowing users to say goodbye to manual calorie counting. You can easily access these features by messaging Rex on WhatsApp at +1 (229) 394-2678.

Rex.fit also caters to businesses, offering white-label solutions for gym chains, wellness centers, and healthcare providers. This flexibility has the potential to enhance the health and fitness landscape on both individual and institutional levels.

The company is actively innovating, providing tools like an AI Meal Planner, TDEE Calculator, and a BMI Calculator to support users on their journey to better health. As testimonials from satisfied users showcase, Rex.fit isnâ€™t just another app; itâ€™s a virtual health companion that motivates and guides its users towards their fitness goals.

If you're looking for a transformative health experience, take a look at [Rex.fit](https://www.rex.fit) and start your journey today. Embrace a future where nutrition tracking is as easy as chatting with a friend!
